number.name: NumberOfSpiComponents
number.ui_params: {'description':'If this setting is set to 1 component Flash Component 2 Size will be ignored and register FLCOMP.C1DEN will be overriden with 0xF', 'quick_option': 'true'}
number.label: Number Of SPI Components

bit.name: IntelMEStrap1_USB2DbCportenable
bit.label: USB2 DbC port enable
bit.ui_params: {'read_only': 'false', 'description':'This setting dedicates USB2 STD-A port for USB2 DbC exclusively. It blocks functional traffic on this port and USB.DbC traffic on all other ports, including USB Type-C ports. Note: These fields do not apply to USB Type-C ports.'}
bit.params: {'value_list':{'USB2 Port 1 DbC enabled':'0x0','USB2 Port 2 DbC enabled':'0x1','USB2 Port 3 DbC enabled':'0x2','USB2 Port 4 DbC enabled':'0x3','USB2 Port 5 DbC enabled':'0x4','USB2 Port 6 DbC enabled':'0x5','USB2 Port 7 DbC enabled':'0x6','USB2 Port 8 DbC enabled':'0x7','USB2 Port 9 DbC enabled':'0x8','USB2 Port 10 DbC enabled':'0x9','USB2 Port 11 DbC enabled':'0xA','USB2 Port 12 DbC enabled':'0xB','USB2 Port 13 DbC enabled':'0xC','USB2 Port 14 DbC enabled':'0xD','No USB2 ports are assigned to DbC':'0xFF'} }

bit.name: IntelMEStrap1_USB3DbCportenable
bit.label: USB3 DbC port enable
bit.ui_params: {'read_only': 'false', 'description':'This setting determines which USB3 port goes to the target USB2 ports connector for Early DbC debugging.'}
bit.params: {'value_list':{'USB3 Port 1 DbC enabled':'0x0','USB3 Port 2 DbC enabled':'0x1','USB3 Port 3 DbC enabled':'0x2','USB3 Port 4 DbC enabled':'0x3','USB3 Port 5 DbC enabled':'0x4','USB3 Port 6 DbC enabled':'0x5','USB3 Port 7 DbC enabled':'0x6','USB3 Port 8 DbC enabled':'0x7','USB3 Port 9 DbC enabled':'0x8','USB3 Port 10 DbC enabled':'0x9','No USB3 ports are assigned to DbC':'0xFF'} }

bit_field.name: flreg8
bit_field.map_name: FLREG8 - Flash Region 8 (Baseboard Management Controller) Register
